prev.title: Contacts: Viewing Channels of a Contact

title: Contacts: Viewing the Program Properties of a Contact
body:
Contacts: Viewing the Program Properties of a Contact¶

Properties displays the properties of the programs that are a part of the contact’s team.
If the contact has completed these fields, their response will be recorded and displayed.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click CRM

  3. Click Contacts

  4. Click a contact

  5. Click Properties

  6. Click a program to expand properties of a program and the contact’s property responses

    • Click again to minimize
